channel.title: Server Problem *NEED HELP ASAP*
channel.description:
My server is 24/7 with good connection, holds about 50-60 players (most players at once) without any lag. But randomly every few hours, I look in my "run.bat" and I just see something like
[code]null null null null null null [/code] Just being added every second,
When I log in the server everything is repeated..If someone teleports, the teleport will be repeated over 100 times, if someone talks, there text is repeated over 100 times. Only time I can stop it is if I close the "run.bat" and re-open it. I want to get rid of this as it may make a large portion of my players quit/stop playing.

item.title: Server Problem *NEED HELP ASAP*
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

There are no errors, and it can happen even with the smallest amount of players. I believe it is caused by trade duping, but from testing it only occurs for 1-2 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem *NEED HELP ASAP*
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If its being added that constantly, its more than likely in your process boolean, Search there for any error. If your holding 60 players, You must have a familarity with Java. Check there for errors.

Read full topic
